pageTitle: The Prime Minister announces changes in the senior ranks of the Public Service | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, today announced the following changes in the senior ranks of the Public Service:

Nada Semaan, currently Associate Deputy Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, becomes Director of the Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre, effective March 5, 2018.

Sarah Paquet, currently Senior Assistant Deputy Minister, Strategy Branch, Shared Services Canada, becomes Executive Vice-President of Shared Services Canada, effective February 28, 2018.

The Prime Minister took the opportunity to congratulate GÃ©rald Cossette, Director of the Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre, on the occasion of his retirement from the Public Service, following an exceptional career marked by dedication and excellence in serving Canadians.

Biographical notes

  • Nada Semaan
  • Sarah Paquet
